title: Super Onion Boy 2
description: Super Onion Boy 2 is a 2D retro-style adventure game where your mission is to save your friend, who has been captured by a terrible monster with psychic powers. Defeat enemies along the way using superpowers and epic transformations, collect coins and stars to earn extra lives, find chests with magic potions, and defeat all the terrible bosses until you reach the final showdown. After saving a princess from the clutches of a terrible monster, Onion Boy wakes up in the forest, unsure if it was real or just a dream. He decides to return to the place where he saved her. Enjoy this pixelated art game and have fun on your quest!
